mapper.update: UPDATE usercoupon SET userid=#{userid},couponid=#{couponid} WHERE usercouponid=#{usercouponid}
mapper.select: SELECT uc.userid, c.couponid, c.couponname AS coupon_couponname, c.couponprice AS coupon_couponprice FROM usercoupon uc INNER JOIN coupon c ON uc.couponid = c.couponid INNER JOIN user u ON u.userid = uc.userid WHERE uc.userid = #{userid}

select uc.usercouponid, uc.userid, uc.couponid from usercoupon uc inner join user u on uc.userid=u.userid inner join coupon c on uc.couponid = c.couponid where uc.userid=#{userid} and c.couponprice=#{willusecoupon}
